title: Unraveling
description:
David Drake, Maureen Ferguson, and Jesse Bradley share stories about pooping in parking lots, a father's strange farewell, and learning to drive.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Håkon Kornstad, David Drake, Lou Bega, Maureen Ferguson, James, Jesse Bradley, The Pretenders, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr)
